description:
Build an immersive, sci-fi inspired 'Bio-Stasis Monitor' web app that reminds users to stand up through a stunning holographic interface. The design should feature a premium Glassmorphism aesthetic with frosted, translucent cards floating over a deep, animated void background filled with drifting neon particles and parallax starfields. The central focus is a 'Vitality Orb'â€”a glowing sphere of fluid liquid that slowly solidifies, cracks, and darkens as the sitting timer counts down.

Include a circular, drag-controlled slider for setting time intervals that emits light trails and visual ripple effects upon interaction. When the reminder triggers, transition the entire UI into a 'Critical Alert' mode: the background shifts to an urgent amber or crimson pulse, the glass panels crackle with stylized digital glitch effects, and massive, bold typography animates onto the screen letter-by-letter urging movement. To reset the cycle, users must engage a 'Recharge' button with a click-and-hold interaction that generates an intensifying energy buildup, ending in a screen-clearing shockwave effect and a burst of neon confetti particles, restoring the orb to its bright, fluid state. Use smooth CSS keyframe animations, backdrop filters, vibrant gradient borders, and hover-triggered 3D tilts to create a polished, high-tech experience.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no">
    <title>Kinetic Vitality Monitor</title>
    <style>
        :root {
            --primary: #00f2ff;
            --primary-dim: rgba(0, 242, 255, 0.3);
            --secondary: #0051ff;
            --danger: #ff2a2a;
            --warning: #ffae00;
            --success: #00ff6a;
            --void-bg: #05070a;
            --glass-bg: rgba(10, 20, 30, 0.6);
            --glass-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            --glass-shadow: 0 8px 32px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
            --font-display: 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
            --font-mono: 'Courier New', Courier, monospace;
        }

        * {
            box-sizing: border-box;
            user-select: none;
            -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;
        }

        body, html {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background-color: var(--void-bg);
            font-family: var(--font-display);
            overflow: hidden;
            color: #fff;
        }

        /* Background Canvas */
        #cosmos {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            z-index: 0;
        }

        /* Layout */
        .viewport {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 10;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            perspective: 1000px;
        }

        /* Main Holographic Interface */
        .holo-card {
            position: relative;
            width: 90%;
            max-width: 450px;
            background: var(--glass-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
            -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
            border: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
            border-radius: 30px;
            padding: 40px 20px;
            box-shadow: var(--glass-shadow), 0 0 15px rgba(0, 242, 255, 0.05);
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            transition: transform 0.1s ease-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease, border-color 0.3s;
            transform-style: preserve-3d;
        }

        .holo-card::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            inset: 0;
            border-radius: 30px;
            padding: 1px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.4), rgba(255,255,255,0));
            -webkit-mask: linear-gradient(#fff 0 0) content-box, linear-gradient(#fff 0 0);
            -webkit-mask-composite: xor;
            mask-composite: exclude;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        /* Header */
        .status-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .status-label {
            font-family: var(--font-mono);
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            letter-spacing: 4px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }

        .status-value {
            font-size: 1.4rem;
            font-weight: 800;
            color: var(--primary);
            text-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 242, 255, 0.6);
            transition: color 0.5s, text-shadow 0.5s;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
        }

        /* The Vitality Orb Container & Sliders */
        .orb-container {
            position: relative;
            width: 260px;
            height: 260px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
        }

        /* The Central Orb */
        .vitality-orb {
            width: 150px;
            height: 150px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, #aeeeee, var(--primary), var(--secondary), #000);
            box-shadow: 
                inset -20px -20px 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.5),
                inset 20px 20px 50px rgba(255,255,255,0.5),
                0 0 30px var(--primary);
            position: absolute;
            z-index: 5;
            transition: filter 1s, background 1s, box-shadow 1s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        
        .orb-container:active .vitality-orb {
            transform: scale(0.95);
        }

        /* Orb Animation States */
        .orb-fluid {
            animation: morph 8s ease-in-out infinite;
        }
        
        .orb-viscous {
            animation: morph 15s ease-in-out infinite;
            filter: hue-rotate(40deg) contrast(1.2);
        }

        .orb-solid {
            animation: none;
            background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, #555, #222, #000);
            box-shadow: inset 0 0 20px #000;
            border-radius: 50% !important;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .orb-solid::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;
            background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='200' height='200' viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath d='M100 100 L120 40 M100 100 L160 120 M100 100 L40 140 M100 100 L60 60' stroke='rgba(0,0,0,0.8)' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");
            opacity: 0.7;
            border-radius: 50%;
        }

        @keyframes morph {
            0% { border-radius: 60% 40% 30% 70%/60% 30% 70% 40%; }
            25% { border-radius: 30% 60% 70% 40%/50% 60% 30% 60%; }
            50% { border-radius: 40% 60% 40% 60%/40% 50% 60% 50%; }
            75% { border-radius: 60% 40% 60% 40%/60% 40% 50% 50%; }
            100% { border-radius: 60% 40% 30% 70%/60% 30% 70% 40%; }
        }

        /* Circular Slider (SVG) */
        .slider-svg {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            transform: rotate(-90deg);
            z-index: 10;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        
        /* Ticks and Track */
        .slider-track-bg {
            fill: none;
            stroke: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
            stroke-width: 12;
        }
        
        .slider-track {
            fill: none;
            stroke: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            stroke-width: 2;
            stroke-dasharray: 4 6; /* Dotted look */
        }

        .tick-mark {
            stroke: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            stroke-width: 2;
        }
        .tick-mark.major {
            stroke: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
            stroke-width: 3;
        }

        .slider-progress {
            fill: none;
            stroke: var(--primary);
            stroke-width: 6;
            stroke-linecap: round;
            /* 2 * PI * 110 = ~691 */
            stroke-dasharray: 691; 
            stroke-dashoffset: 0;
            transition: stroke-dashoffset 0.1s linear, stroke 0.3s;
            filter: drop-shadow(0 0 5px var(--primary));
        }

        /* Guide Line (Visible on drag) */
        .drag-guide-line {
            stroke: var(--primary);
            stroke-width: 1;
            stroke-dasharray: 4 4;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.2s;
        }
        .drag-guide-line.active {
            opacity: 0.5;
        }

        /* Invisible interactive layer */
        .slider-interaction {
            position: absolute;
            inset: -15px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            cursor: grab;
            z-index: 20;
        }
        .slider-interaction:active {
            cursor: grabbing;
        }

        /* Slider Thumb */
        .slider-thumb {
            position: absolute;
            width: 24px;
            height: 24px;
            background: #fff;
            border-radius: 50%;
            top: 50%;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
            box-shadow: 0 0 15px #fff, 0 0 30px var(--primary);
            pointer-events: none;
            z-index: 21;
            transition: width 0.2s, height 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
        }
        
        .is-dragging .slider-thumb {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 25px #fff, 0 0 50px var(--primary);
        }

        /* Timer Display */
        .timer-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            height: 80px; /* fixed height to prevent jump */
        }

        .timer-display {
            font-family: var(--font-mono);
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-align: center;
            color: #fff;
            text-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255,255,255,0.4);
            letter-spacing: 2px;
            line-height: 1;
            margin: 0;
        }
        
        .timer-label {
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            color: var(--primary);
            letter-spacing: 3px;
            font-weight: bold;
            opacity: 0;
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            transition: all 0.2s;
            margin-top: 5px;
        }

        .is-dragging .timer-label {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        .guide-text {
            font-family: var(--font-mono);
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            color: rgba(255,255,255,0.4);
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            margin-top: 5px;
            margin-bottom: 25px;
            text-align: center;
            transition: opacity 0.3s;
        }
        
        .is-dragging ~ .guide-text {
            opacity: 0.2;
        }

        /* Activity Button */
        .recharge-container {
            position: relative;
            margin-top: 10px;
            width: 100%;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .btn-recharge {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent 0%, rgba(0, 242, 255, 0.1) 50%, transparent 100%);
            border: 1px solid var(--primary);
            color: var(--primary);
            padding: 18px 25px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            font-family: var(--font-display);
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
            cursor: pointer;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: all 0.3s;
            border-radius: 4px;
            outline: none;
            font-weight: 700;
            width: 100%;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 5px;
        }

        .btn-recharge::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0; left: 0; width: 0%; height: 100%;
            background: var(--primary);
            opacity: 0.3;
            transition: width 0.1s linear;
            z-index: 0;
        }

        .btn-recharge span {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        
        .btn-subtext {
            font-size: 0.6rem;
            opacity: 0.7;
            font-family: var(--font-mono);
        }

        .btn-recharge:hover {
            box-shadow: 0 0 25px var(--primary);
            background: rgba(0, 242, 255, 0.15);
            text-shadow: 0 0 8px var(--primary);
            letter-spacing: 3px;
        }

        .btn-recharge.holding {
            animation: shake 0.5s linear infinite;
            border-color: #fff;
            color: #fff;
        }

        .btn-recharge.holding::before {
            width: 100%;
            transition: width 2s linear; /* Match hold duration */
            opacity: 0.6;
            background: var(--success);
        }

        @keyframes shake {
            0% { transform: translate(1px, 1px) rotate(0deg); }
            10% { transform: translate(-1px, -2px) rotate(-1deg); }
            20% { transform: translate(-3px, 0px) rotate(1deg); }
            30% { transform: translate(3px, 2px) rotate(0deg); }
            40% { transform: translate(1px, -1px) rotate(1deg); }
            50% { transform: translate(-1px, 2px) rotate(-1deg); }
            60% { transform: translate(-3px, 1px) rotate(0deg); }
            70% { transform: translate(3px, 1px) rotate(-1deg); }
            80% { transform: translate(-1px, -1px) rotate(1deg); }
            90% { transform: translate(1px, 2px) rotate(0deg); }
            100% { transform: translate(1px, -2px) rotate(-1deg); }
        }

        /* Critical Alert Mode Styling */
        body.critical-alert {
            background: #1a0000;
        }

        body.critical-alert .holo-card {
            border-color: var(--danger);
            box-shadow: 0 0 50px rgba(255, 42, 42, 0.4);
            animation: alertPulse 1s infinite alternate;
        }

        body.critical-alert .status-value {
            color: var(--danger);
            text-shadow: 0 0 20px var(--danger);
        }

        body.critical-alert .slider-progress {
            stroke: var(--danger);
            filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px var(--danger));
        }

        body.critical-alert .btn-recharge {
            border-color: var(--danger);
            color: var(--danger);
            background: rgba(255, 42, 42, 0.05);
            opacity: 0; /* Hide default button in alert mode to favor overlay button */
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        @keyframes alertPulse {
            from { box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 42, 42, 0.2); border-color: rgba(255, 42, 42, 0.5); }
            to { box-shadow: 0 0 80px rgba(255, 42, 42, 0.6); border-color: rgba(255, 42, 42, 1); }
        }

        /* Fullscreen Overlay for Critical Text */
        #alert-overlay {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;
            background: rgba(20, 0, 0, 0.95);
            z-index: 100;
            display: none;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
            pointer-events: none; /* Container passes clicks */
        }

        #alert-overlay.active {
            display: flex;
        }

        .glitch-text {
            font-size: 5rem;
            font-weight: 900;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            color: #fff;
            position: relative;
            text-shadow: 4px 4px var(--danger);
            animation: glitch 1s infinite linear alternate-reverse;
            text-align: center;
            line-height: 1;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .glitch-sub {
            font-family: var(--font-mono);
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--warning);
            margin-top: 10px;
            letter-spacing: 8px;
            font-weight: bold;
            animation: flash 0.5s infinite;
            text-align: center;
        }

        /* NEW: Emergency Reset Button Styling */
        .btn-emergency-reset {
            margin-top: 60px;
            background: transparent;
            border: 2px solid var(--danger);
            color: var(--danger);
            font-family: var(--font-display);
            font-size: 1.4rem;
            font-weight: 900;
            padding: 25px 50px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 4px;
            cursor: pointer;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: all 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);
            pointer-events: auto; /* Enable interaction within overlay */
            box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(255, 42, 42, 0.2), inset 0 0 20px rgba(255, 42, 42, 0.1);
            z-index: 101;
            clip-path: polygon(10% 0, 100% 0, 100% 70%, 90% 100%, 0 100%, 0 30%);
        }

        .btn-emergency-reset::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0; left: -100%; width: 100%; height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 42, 42, 0.8), transparent);
            transform: skewX(-20deg);
            transition: left 0.5s;
        }

        .btn-emergency-reset:hover::before {
            left: 100%;
            transition: left 0.5s;
        }

        .btn-emergency-reset:hover {
            background: var(--danger);
            color: #000;
            box-shadow: 0 0 60px rgba(255, 42, 42, 0.8);
            transform: scale(1.05);
            text-shadow: none;
        }
        
        .btn-emergency-reset:active {
            transform: scale(0.95);
        }

        @keyframes glitch {
            0% { clip-path: inset(20% 0 80% 0); transform: translate(-2px, 2px); }
            20% { clip-path: inset(60% 0 10% 0); transform: translate(2px, -2px); }
            40% { clip-path: inset(40% 0 50% 0); transform: translate(-2px, 2px); }
            60% { clip-path: inset(80% 0 5% 0); transform: translate(2px, -2px); }
            80% { clip-path: inset(10% 0 60% 0); transform: translate(-1px, 1px); }
            100% { clip-path: inset(30% 0 20% 0); transform: translate(1px, -1px); }
        }

        @keyframes flash {
            0%, 100% { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); }
            50% { opacity: 0.5; transform: scale(0.98); }
        }

        /* Shockwave Effect */
        #shockwave {
            position: fixed;
            top: 50%; left: 50%;
            width: 0; height: 0;
            background: radial-gradient(circle, #fff 0%, transparent 70%);
            border-radius: 50%;
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
            z-index: 200;
            pointer-events: none;
            opacity: 0;
            mix-blend-mode: overlay;
        }

        /* Modal */
        .modal-overlay {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;
            background: rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
            backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
            z-index: 300;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            opacity: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
            transition: opacity 0.4s;
        }

        .modal-overlay.open {
            opacity: 1;
            pointer-events: auto;
        }

        .modal-content {
            background: rgba(10, 15, 25, 0.95);
            border: 1px solid var(--primary);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 40px;
            width: 90%;
            max-width: 500px;
            text-align: center;
            box-shadow: 0 0 50px rgba(0, 242, 255, 0.15);
            transform: scale(0.9) translateY(20px);
            transition: transform 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);
        }

        .modal-overlay.open .modal-content {
            transform: scale(1) translateY(0);
        }

        .modal-title {
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 3px;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 242, 255, 0.3);
            padding-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .modal-body {
            color: #ccc;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            line-height: 1.6;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }

        .modal-highlight {
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: var(--primary);
        }

        .btn-modal {
            background: var(--primary);
            color: #000;
            border: none;
            padding: 15px 40px;
            font-weight: 800;
            border-radius: 4px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s;
            font-size: 1rem;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 242, 255, 0.3);
        }

        .btn-modal:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
            background: #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
        }

        /* Particle Canvas for Confetti */
        #fx-canvas {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;
            pointer-events: none;
            z-index: 150;
        }

    </style>
</head>

        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        /**
         * System Core: Kinetic Vitality Monitor
         */

        // --- Configuration & State ---
        const state = {
            totalTime: 45 * 60, // seconds
            currentTime: 45 * 60,
            isRunning: false,
            isDragging: false,
            isAlert: false,
            holdStartTime: 0,
            holdDuration: 2000, // ms to recharge
            timerInterval: null,
            holdInterval: null,
            lastDragMinute: -1
        };

        // --- DOM Elements ---
        const els = {
            body: document.body,
            card: document.getElementById('interface-card'),
            orb: document.getElementById('vitality-orb'),
            progressRing: document.getElementById('progress-ring'),
            thumb: document.getElementById('slider-thumb'),
            dragArea: document.getElementById('slider-drag-area'),
            dragGuide: document.getElementById('drag-guide'),
            timerText: document.getElementById('timer-text'),
            timerLabel: document.getElementById('timer-label'),
            statusText: document.getElementById('status-text'),
            rechargeBtn: document.getElementById('btn-recharge'),
            btnMainText: document.getElementById('btn-main-text'),
            alertOverlay: document.getElementById('alert-overlay'),
            emergencyBtn: document.getElementById('btn-emergency-reset'),
            shockwave: document.getElementById('shockwave'),
            cosmos: document.getElementById('cosmos'),
            fxCanvas: document.getElementById('fx-canvas'),
            modal: document.getElementById('intro-modal'),
            startBtn: document.getElementById('btn-start')
        };

        // --- Audio Context ---
        let audioCtx;
        
        function initAudio() {
            if (!audioCtx) {
                audioCtx = new (window.AudioContext || window.webkitAudioContext)();
            }
        }

        function playSound(type) {
            if (!audioCtx) return;
            const osc = audioCtx.createOscillator();
            const gain = audioCtx.createGain();
            osc.connect(gain);
            gain.connect(audioCtx.destination);

            const now = audioCtx.currentTime;

            if (type === 'tick') {
                osc.type = 'sine';
                osc.frequency.setValueAtTime(800, now);
                osc.frequency.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(0.01, now + 0.05);
                gain.gain.setValueAtTime(0.05, now);
                gain.gain.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(0.001, now + 0.05);
                osc.start(now);
                osc.stop(now + 0.05);
            } else if (type === 'blip') {
                // Short blip for slider UI
                osc.type = 'triangle';
                osc.frequency.setValueAtTime(600, now);
                gain.gain.setValueAtTime(0.03, now);
                gain.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(0, now + 0.03);
                osc.start(now);
                osc.stop(now + 0.03);
            } else if (type === 'alert') {
                // Harsh sawtooth for alarm
                osc.type = 'sawtooth';
                osc.frequency.setValueAtTime(100, now);
                osc.frequency.linearRampToValueAtTime(400, now + 0.4);
                gain.gain.setValueAtTime(0.15, now);
                gain.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(0, now + 0.4);
                osc.start(now);
                osc.stop(now + 0.4);
            } else if (type === 'charging') {
                // Rising pitch while holding
                osc.type = 'triangle';
                osc.frequency.setValueAtTime(200, now);
                osc.frequency.linearRampToValueAtTime(600, now + 2);
                gain.gain.setValueAtTime(0.1, now);
                osc.start(now);
                osc.stop(now + 2);
            } else if (type === 'charged') {
                // Success chord effect
                osc.type = 'square';
                osc.frequency.setValueAtTime(440, now);
                osc.frequency.setValueAtTime(554, now + 0.1); // C#
                osc.frequency.setValueAtTime(659, now + 0.2); // E
                osc.frequency.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(880, now + 0.6);
                gain.gain.setValueAtTime(0.1, now);
                gain.gain.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(0.001, now + 1.5);
                osc.start(now);
                osc.stop(now + 1.5);
            }
        }

        // --- Initialization ---
        window.onload = () => {
            // Setup Slider Math (Radius 110)
            const circumference = 2 * Math.PI * 110;
            els.progressRing.style.strokeDasharray = `${circumference} ${circumference}`;
            els.progressRing.style.strokeDashoffset = 0;

            setupCosmos();
            setupInteractions();
            
            // Show modal
            setTimeout(() => els.modal.classList.add('open'), 500);
        };

        // --- Timer Logic ---
        function startTimer() {
            if (state.timerInterval) clearInterval(state.timerInterval);
            state.isRunning = true;
            
            state.timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
                if (state.currentTime > 0) {
                    state.currentTime--;
                    updateUI();
                } else {
                    triggerAlert();
                }
            }, 1000);
        }

        function updateUI() {
            // Visual Calculation using "Clock Face" Metaphor (0-60 mins fixed scale)
            // 1 Hour = 3600 seconds = Full Circle
            const fullScaleSeconds = 3600; 
            
            // Limit visualization to max 100% (in case we want longer timers later, but stick to 60 for now)
            let visualPct = state.currentTime / fullScaleSeconds;
            if (visualPct > 1) visualPct = 1;

            // Timer Text
            const m = Math.floor(state.currentTime / 60);
            const s = state.currentTime % 60;
            els.timerText.innerText = `${m.toString().padStart(2, '0')}:${s.toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;

            // Progress Ring stroke offset
            const radius = 110;
            const circumference = 2 * Math.PI * radius;
            const offset = circumference - (visualPct * circumference);
            els.progressRing.style.strokeDashoffset = offset;

            // Thumb Position Calculation
            // Angle corresponds to the visual percentage of the 60min circle
            const angle = 360 * visualPct; 
            const angleRad = (angle - 90) * (Math.PI / 180);
            const tx = 120 + 110 * Math.cos(angleRad);
            const ty = 120 + 110 * Math.sin(angleRad);
            els.thumb.style.left = `${tx}px`;
            els.thumb.style.top = `${ty}px`;
            
            // Drag Guide Line (Visible only during drag)
            if(state.isDragging) {
                const guideX = 120 + 110 * Math.cos(angleRad);
                const guideY = 120 + 110 * Math.sin(angleRad);
                els.dragGuide.setAttribute('x2', guideX);
                els.dragGuide.setAttribute('y2', guideY);
            }

            // Orb State based on percentage of TOTAL set time (Integrity)
            // If total time is small (e.g. 1 min), decay happens fast.
            const integrityPct = state.currentTime / state.totalTime;
            updateOrbVisuals(integrityPct);
        }

        function updateOrbVisuals(pct) {
            if (state.isAlert) return;

            if (pct > 0.5) {
                els.orb.className = 'vitality-orb orb-fluid';
                els.orb.style.filter = '';
                els.statusText.innerText = "OPTIMAL";
                els.statusText.style.color = "var(--primary)";
            } else if (pct > 0.1) {
                els.orb.className = 'vitality-orb orb-viscous';
                els.statusText.innerText = "DECAYING";
                els.statusText.style.color = "var(--warning)";
            } else {
                els.orb.className = 'vitality-orb orb-solid';
                els.statusText.innerText = "CRITICAL";
                els.statusText.style.color = "var(--danger)";
            }
        }

        function triggerAlert() {
            clearInterval(state.timerInterval);
            state.isAlert = true;
            state.isRunning = false;
            
            els.body.classList.add('critical-alert');
            els.alertOverlay.classList.add('active');
            els.statusText.innerText = "FAILURE";
            els.orb.className = 'vitality-orb orb-solid';
            
            // Pulse sound loop
            playSound('alert');
            state.timerInterval = setInterval(() => playSound('alert'), 2000);
        }

        function resetSystem() {
            clearInterval(state.timerInterval);
            state.isAlert = false;
            state.currentTime = state.totalTime;
            
            // Visual Reset
            els.body.classList.remove('critical-alert');
            els.alertOverlay.classList.remove('active');
            els.btnMainText.innerText = "Hold: Confirm Walk";
            
            // Shockwave
            els.shockwave.style.transition = 'none';
            els.shockwave.style.width = '0';
            els.shockwave.style.height = '0';
            els.shockwave.style.opacity = '0.8';
            
            // Force reflow
            void els.shockwave.offsetWidth;

            els.shockwave.style.transition = 'all 0.8s ease-out';
            els.shockwave.style.width = '250vmax';
            els.shockwave.style.height = '250vmax';
            els.shockwave.style.opacity = '0';

            playSound('charged');
            createConfetti();
            updateUI();
            startTimer();
        }

        // --- Interaction Logic ---
        function setupInteractions() {
            // Modal
            els.startBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                els.modal.classList.remove('open');
                initAudio();
                startTimer();
            });

            // NEW: Emergency Button Reset
            els.emergencyBtn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                e.stopPropagation(); // prevent bubbling issues
                resetSystem();
            });

            // Standard Recharge Button (Hold Mechanic)
            const startHold = (e) => {
                if(state.isAlert) return; // Disable standard hold during alert to force use of big button
                if(e.type === 'touchstart') e.preventDefault(); 
                
                // Audio feedback for charging
                playSound('charging');
                
                els.rechargeBtn.classList.add('holding');
                state.holdStartTime = Date.now();
                
                state.holdInterval = setTimeout(() => {
                    resetSystem();
                    endHold();
                }, state.holdDuration);
            };

            const endHold = () => {
                els.rechargeBtn.classList.remove('holding');
                clearTimeout(state.holdInterval);
            };

            els.rechargeBtn.addEventListener('mousedown', startHold);
            els.rechargeBtn.addEventListener('touchstart', startHold);
            
            window.addEventListener('mouseup', endHold);
            window.addEventListener('touchend', endHold);

            // Slider Dragging Logic
            const updateFromDrag = (clientX, clientY) => {
                const rect = els.dragArea.getBoundingClientRect();
                const cx = rect.left + rect.width / 2;
                const cy = rect.top + rect.height / 2;
                
                // Calculate angle from center
                let angle = Math.atan2(clientY - cy, clientX - cx) * (180 / Math.PI);
                angle += 90; 
                if (angle < 0) angle += 360;

                // Map angle (0-360) to Minutes (0-60)
                const pct = angle / 360;
                let minutes = Math.round(pct * 60);
                
                // Snap to valid range
                if (minutes < 1) minutes = 60; // 12 o'clock can be 0 or 60, prefer 60
                if (minutes === 60 && pct < 0.1) minutes = 1; // Prevent jump to 60 near 0
                minutes = Math.max(1, Math.min(60, minutes));

                // Haptic Audio Feedback
                if (minutes !== state.lastDragMinute) {
                    playSound('blip');
                    state.lastDragMinute = minutes;
                }

                state.totalTime = minutes * 60;
                state.currentTime = state.totalTime;
                updateUI();
            };

            const dragStart = (e) => {
                if(state.isAlert) return; // No dragging during alert
                state.isDragging = true;
                els.body.classList.add('is-dragging');
                els.dragArea.style.cursor = 'grabbing';
                els.dragGuide.classList.add('active');
                clearInterval(state.timerInterval);
                
                const clientX = e.touches ? e.touches[0].clientX : e.clientX;
                const clientY = e.touches ? e.touches[0].clientY : e.clientY;
                updateFromDrag(clientX, clientY);
            };

            const dragMove = (e) => {
                if (!state.isDragging) return;
                // prevent scrolling on mobile
                if (e.touches) e.preventDefault();
                
                const clientX = e.touches ? e.touches[0].clientX : e.clientX;
                const clientY = e.touches ? e.touches[0].clientY : e.clientY;
                updateFromDrag(clientX, clientY);
            };

            const dragEnd = () => {
                if (state.isDragging) {
                    state.isDragging = false;
                    els.body.classList.remove('is-dragging');
                    els.dragGuide.classList.remove('active');
                    els.dragArea.style.cursor = 'grab';
                    state.lastDragMinute = -1;
                    if (!state.isAlert) startTimer();
                }
            };

            els.dragArea.addEventListener('mousedown', dragStart);
            els.dragArea.addEventListener('touchstart', dragStart, {passive: false});
            
            window.addEventListener('mousemove', dragMove);
            window.addEventListener('touchmove', dragMove, {passive: false});
            
            window.addEventListener('mouseup', dragEnd);
            window.addEventListener('touchend', dragEnd);
            
            // 3D Tilt Effect on Card
            const card = els.card;
            window.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
                if(window.innerWidth < 768) return;
                const x = (window.innerWidth / 2 - e.pageX) / 25;
                const y = (window.innerHeight / 2 - e.pageY) / 25;
                card.style.transform = `rotateY(${x}deg) rotateX(${y}deg)`;
            });
        }


        // --- Visual Effects (Canvas) ---
        
        // Cosmos Background
        function setupCosmos() {
            const canvas = els.cosmos;
            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
            let width, height;
            let particles = [];

            function resize() {
                width = canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
                height = canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
            }

            class Star {
                constructor() {
                    this.reset();
                    this.y = Math.random() * height; 
                }
                reset() {
                    this.x = Math.random() * width;
                    this.y = -10;
                    this.z = Math.random() * 2 + 0.5; // speed
                    this.size = Math.random() * 2;
                    this.opacity = Math.random() * 0.5 + 0.1;
                }
                update() {
                    this.y += this.z * (state.isAlert ? 8 : 0.5); // Very fast in alert mode
                    if (this.y > height) this.reset();
                    this.draw();
                }
                draw() {
                    ctx.fillStyle = state.isAlert ? `rgba(255, 60, 60, ${this.opacity})` : `rgba(255, 255, 255, ${this.opacity})`;
                    ctx.beginPath();
                    ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
                    ctx.fill();
                }
            }

            for(let i=0; i<150; i++) particles.push(new Star());

            window.addEventListener('resize', resize);
            resize();

            function animate() {
                // Clear trails
                ctx.fillStyle = state.isAlert ? 'rgba(20, 0, 0, 0.2)' : 'rgba(5, 7, 10, 0.2)';
                ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);
                particles.forEach(p => p.update());
                requestAnimationFrame(animate);
            }
            animate();
        }

        // Confetti System
        function createConfetti() {
            const canvas = els.fxCanvas;
            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
            canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
            canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
            
            let particles = [];
            const colors = ['#00f2ff', '#00ff6a', '#ffffff', '#0051ff'];

            for (let i = 0; i < 150; i++) {
                particles.push({
                    x: canvas.width / 2,
                    y: canvas.height / 2,
                    vx: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 25,
                    vy: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 25,
                    size: Math.random() * 6 + 2,
                    color: colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)],
                    life: 1,
                    decay: Math.random() * 0.02 + 0.005
                });
            }

            function render() {
                ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
                let active = false;
                
                particles.forEach(p => {
                    if (p.life > 0) {
                        active = true;
                        p.x += p.vx;
                        p.y += p.vy;
                        p.vx *= 0.95; // Friction
                        p.vy *= 0.95;
                        p.life -= p.decay;
                        
                        ctx.globalAlpha = p.life;
                        ctx.fillStyle = p.color;
                        ctx.beginPath();
                        ctx.arc(p.x, p.y, p.size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
                        ctx.fill();
                    }
                });

                if (active) requestAnimationFrame(render);
                else ctx.clearRect(0,0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
            }
            render();
        }

    </script>
</body>

    <script>
        // --- Game State ---
        const state = {
            heads: 0,
            tails: 0,
            streak: 0,
            lastSide: null,
            isFlipping: false,
            isDragging: false,
            startY: 0,
            currentY: 0,
            power: 0,
            skin: 'gold'
        };

        // --- DOM Elements ---
        const coin = document.getElementById('coin');
        const coinContainer = document.getElementById('coinContainer');
        const instruction = document.getElementById('instruction');
        const dragHint = document.getElementById('dragHint');
        const powerFill = document.getElementById('powerFill');
        const powerGlow = document.getElementById('powerGlow');
        const mainStage = document.getElementById('mainStage');
        const historyStream = document.getElementById('historyStream');
        const arena = document.getElementById('arena');
        
        // Stats DOM
        const countH = document.getElementById('count-h');
        const countT = document.getElementById('count-t');
        const barH = document.getElementById('bar-h');
        const barT = document.getElementById('bar-t');
        const streakCount = document.getElementById('streakCount');
        const streakCard = document.getElementById('streakCard');

        // --- Audio System ---
        let audioCtx = null;

        function initAudio() {
            if (!audioCtx) {
                audioCtx = new (window.AudioContext || window.webkitAudioContext)();
            }
            if (audioCtx.state === 'suspended') {
                audioCtx.resume();
            }
        }

        function playSound(type, intensity = 1) {
            if (!audioCtx) return;
            const osc = audioCtx.createOscillator();
            const gain = audioCtx.createGain();
            osc.connect(gain);
            gain.connect(audioCtx.destination);
            const now = audioCtx.currentTime;

            if (type === 'ratchet') {
                // Clicking sound for drag
                osc.type = 'sawtooth';
                osc.frequency.setValueAtTime(100 + (intensity * 2), now);
                gain.gain.setValueAtTime(0.05, now);
                gain.gain.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(0.001, now + 0.05);
                osc.start(now);
                osc.stop(now + 0.05);
            } else if (type === 'flip') {
                osc.type = 'triangle';
                osc.frequency.setValueAtTime(200, now);
                osc.frequency.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(800 + (intensity * 5), now + 0.4);
                gain.gain.setValueAtTime(0.3, now);
                gain.gain.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(0.01, now + 0.4);
                osc.start(now);
                osc.stop(now + 0.4);
            } else if (type === 'land') {
                osc.type = 'square';
                osc.frequency.setValueAtTime(120, now);
                osc.frequency.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(40, now + 0.2);
                gain.gain.setValueAtTime(0.6, now);
                gain.gain.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(0.01, now + 0.2);
                osc.start(now);
                osc.stop(now + 0.2);
            } else if (type === 'streak') {
                osc.type = 'sine';
                osc.frequency.setValueAtTime(800, now);
                osc.frequency.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(1500, now + 0.3);
                gain.gain.setValueAtTime(0.2, now);
                gain.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(0, now + 0.5);
                osc.start(now);
                osc.stop(now + 0.5);
            }
        }

        // --- DRAG Interaction Logic ---

        function handleStart(y) {
            if (state.isFlipping) return;
            initAudio();
            state.isDragging = true;
            state.startY = y;
            state.power = 0;
            instruction.style.opacity = '0';
            dragHint.style.opacity = '1';
            
            // Visual feedback for grab
            coinContainer.style.transition = 'none'; 
            coinContainer.style.cursor = 'grabbing';
        }

        function handleMove(y) {
            if (!state.isDragging) return;

            const deltaY = y - state.startY;
            
            // Only count downward movement as charge
            if (deltaY > 0) {
                // Calculate power (0 to 100) based on 200px drag
                let rawPower = Math.min(100, (deltaY / 2.5)); 
                
                // Ratchet sound effect on increments
                if (Math.floor(rawPower/5) > Math.floor(state.power/5)) {
                    playSound('ratchet', rawPower);
                }

                state.power = rawPower;

                // Visuals
                updatePowerVisuals(state.power);
                
                // Tilt coin back based on power (max 45deg)
                const tilt = state.power * 0.45;
                const drop = state.power * 0.5;
                
                coinContainer.style.transform = `translateY(${drop}px) rotateX(-${tilt}deg)`;
            }
        }

        function handleEnd() {
            if (!state.isDragging) return;
            state.isDragging = false;
            dragHint.style.opacity = '0';
            
            // Reset cursor
            coinContainer.style.cursor = 'grab';

            // If power is too low, cancel flip
            if (state.power < 10) {
                 coinContainer.style.transition = 'transform 0.3s ease-out';
                 coinContainer.style.transform = 'translateY(0) rotateX(0)';
                 updatePowerVisuals(0);
                 instruction.style.opacity = '1';
                 return;
            }

            flipCoin();
        }

        function updatePowerVisuals(p) {
            // Visual Power Ring Logic
            const hue = 300 - p; // Pink to Yellow/Green
            powerFill.style.border = `6px solid hsl(${hue}, 100%, 60%)`;
            powerFill.style.boxShadow = `0 0 ${p/2}px hsl(${hue}, 100%, 60%)`;
            
            powerFill.style.clipPath = 'none';
            powerFill.style.transform = `scale(${0.8 + (p/500)})`; // Slight pulse
            powerFill.style.opacity = p / 100;
            
            powerGlow.style.opacity = p / 150;
        }


        function flipCoin() {
            state.isFlipping = true;
            playSound('flip', state.power);

            // Random result
            const result = Math.random() < 0.5 ? 'heads' : 'tails';
            
            // Physics Calculation
            // Power (10-100) dictates height and rotation speed
            const height = 150 + (state.power * 2.5); // 150px to 400px up
            const rotations = 5 + Math.floor(state.power / 6); // 5 to 21 spins
            
            // Final degrees: 
            // heads = 360 * rotations
            // tails = 360 * rotations + 180
            const degrees = (rotations * 360) + (result === 'heads' ? 0 : 180);
            
            // Duration: 1s to 2.5s
            const duration = 1 + (state.power / 80);

            // Animation
            coinContainer.style.transition = `transform ${duration}s cubic-bezier(0.25, 1, 0.5, 1)`; // Ease out (gravity)
            
            // Step 1: Shoot Up
            coinContainer.style.transition = `transform ${duration/2}s cubic-bezier(0.1, 0.8, 0.1, 1)`; // Fast up, slow top
            coinContainer.style.transform = `translateY(-${height}px) scale(1.3)`;
            
            // Spin logic on inner coin
            coin.style.transition = `transform ${duration}s cubic-bezier(0.1, 0.8, 0.1, 1)`;
            coin.style.transform = `rotateX(${degrees}deg)`;

            // Step 2: Fall Down
            setTimeout(() => {
                coinContainer.style.transition = `transform ${duration/2}s cubic-bezier(0.8, 0, 0.8, 0.1)`; // Slow top, fast down
                coinContainer.style.transform = `translateY(0px) scale(1)`;
            }, (duration/2) * 1000);

            // Resolve
            setTimeout(() => {
                handleLand(result);
            }, duration * 1000);
            
            // Reset power visuals immediately
            updatePowerVisuals(0);
        }

        function handleLand(result) {
            state.isFlipping = false;
            playSound('land');
            
            if (navigator.vibrate) navigator.vibrate(50);

            // Screen Shake
            mainStage.classList.remove('shake');
            void mainStage.offsetWidth; 
            mainStage.classList.add('shake');

            // Particles
            createParticles(window.innerWidth / 2, window.innerHeight / 2, result === 'heads' ? '#bc13fe' : '#0ff0fc');

            updateStats(result);
            
            instruction.style.opacity = '1';
            instruction.innerHTML = `RESULT: <span style="color:${result === 'heads' ? 'var(--neon-purple)' : 'var(--neon-blue)'}">${result.toUpperCase()}</span>`;
        }

        function updateStats(result) {
            if (result === 'heads') state.heads++;
            else state.tails++;

            if (state.lastSide === result) state.streak++;
            else state.streak = 1;
            
            state.lastSide = result;

            // UI
            countH.innerText = state.heads;
            countT.innerText = state.tails;

            const total = state.heads + state.tails;
            barH.style.width = `${(state.heads / total) * 100}%`;
            barT.style.width = `${(state.tails / total) * 100}%`;

            streakCount.innerText = state.streak;
            
            if (state.streak >= 3) {
                streakCard.classList.add('on-fire');
                playSound('streak');
            } else {
                streakCard.classList.remove('on-fire');
            }

            addToHistory(result);
        }

        function addToHistory(result) {
            const token = document.createElement('div');
            token.className = `history-token token-${result.charAt(0)}`;
            token.innerText = result.charAt(0).toUpperCase();
            historyStream.prepend(token);
            if (historyStream.children.length > 10) historyStream.lastElementChild.remove();
        }

        // --- Customization ---
        function setSkin(type, el) {
            state.skin = type;
            const root = document.documentElement;
            
            document.querySelectorAll('.skin-option').forEach(opt => opt.classList.remove('active'));
            el.classList.add('active');

            if (type === 'gold') {
                root.style.setProperty('--coin-face-bg', 'conic-gradient(from 45deg, #ffd700, #fffacd, #b8860b, #fffacd, #ffd700)');
                root.style.setProperty('--coin-edge-bg', 'repeating-linear-gradient(90deg, #b8860b 0px, #b8860b 1px, #ffd700 2px, #ffd700 4px)');
                root.style.setProperty('--coin-border', '#daa520');
                root.style.setProperty('--coin-glow', 'rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.6)');
            } else if (type === 'holo') {
                root.style.setProperty('--coin-face-bg', 'conic-gradient(from 45deg, #e6e6fa, #0ff0fc, #ff00ff, #0ff0fc, #e6e6fa)');
                root.style.setProperty('--coin-edge-bg', 'repeating-linear-gradient(90deg, #ff00ff 0px, #ff00ff 1px, #0ff0fc 2px, #0ff0fc 4px)');
                root.style.setProperty('--coin-border', '#fff');
                root.style.setProperty('--coin-glow', 'rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.6)');
            } else if (type === 'rust') {
                root.style.setProperty('--coin-face-bg', 'conic-gradient(from 45deg, #8b4513, #cd853f, #552200, #cd853f, #8b4513)');
                root.style.setProperty('--coin-edge-bg', 'repeating-linear-gradient(90deg, #552200 0px, #552200 1px, #8b4513 2px, #8b4513 4px)');
                root.style.setProperty('--coin-border', '#552200');
                root.style.setProperty('--coin-glow', 'rgba(139, 69, 19, 0.6)');
            }
        }

        // --- Event Listeners ---
        
        // Mouse
        arena.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {
            if(e.button === 0) handleStart(e.clientY);
        });
        window.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
            handleMove(e.clientY);
        });
        window.addEventListener('mouseup', handleEnd);

        // Touch
        arena.addEventListener('touchstart', (e) => {
            e.preventDefault(); 
            handleStart(e.touches[0].clientY);
        }, {passive: false});
        
        window.addEventListener('touchmove', (e) => {
            // Prevent scrolling while dragging coin
            if(state.isDragging) e.preventDefault();
            handleMove(e.touches[0].clientY);
        }, {passive: false});
        
        window.addEventListener('touchend', handleEnd);


        // --- Particle System ---
        const canvas = document.getElementById('particle-canvas');
        const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
        let particles = [];

        function resizeCanvas() {
            canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
            canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
        }
        window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);
        resizeCanvas();

        class Particle {
            constructor(x, y, color) {
                this.x = x;
                this.y = y;
                this.color = color;
                this.size = Math.random() * 6 + 3;
                this.speedX = Math.random() * 12 - 6;
                this.speedY = Math.random() * 12 - 6;
                this.life = 1.0;
                this.decay = Math.random() * 0.02 + 0.01;
            }
            update() {
                this.x += this.speedX;
                this.y += this.speedY;
                this.speedY += 0.25; // Gravity
                this.life -= this.decay;
                this.size *= 0.94;
            }
            draw() {
                ctx.globalAlpha = this.life;
                ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
                ctx.beginPath();
                ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
                ctx.fill();
                ctx.globalAlpha = 1.0;
            }
        }

        function createParticles(x, y, color) {
            for (let i = 0; i < 60; i++) {
                particles.push(new Particle(x, y, color));
            }
        }

        function animateParticles() {
            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
            for (let i = 0; i < particles.length; i++) {
                particles[i].update();
                particles[i].draw();
                if (particles[i].life <= 0) {
                    particles.splice(i, 1);
                    i--;
                }
            }
            requestAnimationFrame(animateParticles);
        }
        animateParticles();

        // Settings Logic
        const settingsBtn = document.getElementById('settingsBtn');
        const settingsModal = document.getElementById('settingsModal');
        const closeSettings = document.getElementById('closeSettings');

        settingsBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
            settingsModal.classList.add('active');
        });
        closeSettings.addEventListener('click', () => {
            settingsModal.classList.remove('active');
        });
        settingsModal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            if (e.target === settingsModal) settingsModal.classList.remove('active');
        });

    </script>
</body>
